name: MOUTH: COAST TO COAST THUG DESTANATION DOPAMINE APOTHEOSIS III
name_original: MOUTH: COAST TO COAST THUG DESTANATION DOPAMINE APOTHEOSIS III
description:
REACH OUTTA THA SCREEN AND GRAB YA

A thrill-a-minute story! One against many! Tactical action! More cutscenes than gameplay! Inscrutable! Is this the Metal Gear successor we've been waiting so long for?

Made by my pal Frank "over several late nights."

-----IMPORTANT NOTE-------

This game is a 16-bit application. That means that it will not run natively on a 64-bit system (i.e. the one you are using right now.) You will either need an older computer, or to set up a virtual machine capable of running it. I have included a link to a tutorial on this matter in the read me.

If you go through the effort to play this, You have my sincerest apologies.
